mapper.select: SELECT P.NO, P.WRITER, P.TITLE, P.CONTENT, P.VISITCOUNT, PF.NFILE, PF.OFILE, DATE(P.REGDATE) AS REGDATE FROM PRESS P LEFT OUTER JOIN PRESS_FILE PF ON P.NO = PF.FILENO WHERE P.NO = #{P.NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRESS (WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, VISITCOUNT) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE PRESS SET writer = #{writer}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, regdate = now() WHERE NO = #{NO}
